preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 7.2 g of lithium (Li) using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 4.2 g of phosphorus (P). 
 3. Weigh 5.4 g of rubidium (Rb). 
 4. Weigh 19.2 g of selenium (Se). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all four ingredients. 
 6. Mix the powder thoroughly using a mortar and pestle for a uniform composition.
